description: This database contains a list of individuals licensed by the Used Motor Vehicle and Parts Commission to sale used motor vehicles. Salespersons that are employed by a Franchise Dealership will not appear in this database, their license is issued by the Motor Vehicle Commission.

metadata.attribution: Oklahoma Used Motor Vehicle and Parts Commission
metadata.description: This database contains a list of individuals licensed by the Used Motor Vehicle and Parts Commission to sale used motor vehicles. Salespersons that are employed by a Franchise Dealership will not appear in this database, their license is issued by the Motor Vehicle Commission.

name: Licensed Used Motor Vehicle Salesperson Database
